name: Floral ombré maxi hijabs
description:
Our range of maxi hijabs are definitely a must have in every wardrobe. They are oversized scarfs measuring approximately 110cm in width x 180cm in length. All of our hijabs are made from 100% Viscose material or a mix of Viscose and Cotton, making them very soft, comfortable to wear and easy to style.

Please note colours may vary slightly due to lighting and screen settings on your device.

Can we ask all international customers outside the UK to add the international shipping item, this can be found in the categories tab, which covers full postage.
